titleStmt.title: Jerichoes dovvn-fall as it was presented in a sermon preached in St. Margarets Westminster before the honourable House of Commons at the late solemne fast, Septemb. 28, 1642 / by Thomas Wilson ...
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Thomas, 1601-1653.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
